mapper.select: select * from guestbook order by idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into guestbook(idx, name, subject, content, email, pwd, regdate) values(guestbook_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{email}, #{pwd}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update guestbook set name=#{name}, subject=#{subject} email=#{email}, content=#{content} where idx=#{idx}
